superheros.name: Superman
superheros.description: Superman is a powerful superhero from the planet Krypton, known for his incredible strength, ability to fly, and his commitment to justice.

superheros.name: Spider-Man
superheros.description: Spider-Man is a young hero with the proportionate strength and agility of a spider. He uses his web-shooters to swing through the city and fight crime.

superheros.name: Wonder Woman
superheros.description: Wonder Woman is a warrior princess from the Amazons. She possesses superhuman strength, agility, and the power of the Lasso of Truth.

superheros.name: Batman
superheros.description: Batman is a highly skilled detective and martial artist. He uses his intelligence, gadgets, and martial arts training to fight crime in Gotham City.

superheros.name: Thor
superheros.description: Thor is the god of thunder from Asgard. He wields the enchanted hammer Mjolnir and has the power to control lightning and command the elements.

superheros.name: Iron Man
superheros.description: Iron Man is a billionaire genius who fights crime using his technologically advanced powered armor.
